author: Joshua Fluke
description:
Corporate America has officially lost its mind.

Somewhere in a glass-walled HQ right now, an HR manager is printing out a “Work Hard Play Harder” poster while a VP of Culture is loading a Nerf dart, getting ready to fire it directly into the eyeball of the nearest accountant… all for LinkedIn.

In today’s episode of “Why Did I Go to College for This?” we explore the most unhinged corporate team-building rituals companies proudly blast on LinkedIn like it’s peak innovation.

We’ve got:
• Office Nerf wars
• Donut-eating floor Olympics
• Factory-floor drum circles
• Grown adults singing Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
• A suspiciously sensual “monthly meetup” announcement
• Monopoly as a professional development tool (???)
• HR screaming “CONTENT!!!” instead of fixing anything

If you’ve ever been forced to participate in these cringe “culture events” instead of… you know… doing your job, this one’s for you.

Need a resume / cover letter? ➡️ https://joshuafluke.store

• ✍️
title: CORPORATE TEAMBUILDING IS OUT OF CONTROL!
